translations: n．低能者，愚蠢的人（复数）：指智力低下或行为愚蠢的人。
· Some people think that those who believe in conspiracy theories are morons.
有些人认为那些相信阴谋论的人是愚蠢的。

sentences.sentence: Only I divided mine into Losers, Flameouts, Morons and Slimy Bastards.
sentences.translation: 只不过，我是分为“输家寡人”，“过气明星”，“愚不可及”和“无耻浑蛋”四类。

sentences.sentence: How about "In America we trust" or "At least we're not French", or "Land of yobs(1) and morons(2)".
sentences.translation: 这几个怎么样：“我们信任美国”，“至少我们不是法国人”或者“无赖和笨蛋之都”。
